name: Accuracy Marketing
tag_list: joomla, drupal, cms, design, print, silicon-valley, bay-area, boutique, marketing, advertising, eric, tom, lee, shilo, maggi, ecommerce
overview:
Accuracy Marketing is a Silicon Valley-based boutique marketing, design and promotions agency. We have two decades of experience. We primarily operate in the music, entertainment, fashion, and real estate markets.

Our experienced staff of ninja creatives help transform market insight into marketing intelligence, identifying the right media elements with messages that resonate with decision makers and invoke the dynamic responses you need to expand your business.

Innovation and creativity are the cornerstone of our integrated marketing programs, but great ideas require great execution. From concept to implementation, you can depend on us for seamless execution backed by bulletproof action plans that produce real opportunities and real results. You know, we kick ass on your behalf.
